name: @cubejs-backend/native
author: Cube Dev, Inc.
description: Native module for Cube.js (binding to Rust codebase)

scripts.native:build: tsc && cargo-cp-artifact -a cdylib cubejs-native index.node -- cargo build --message-format=json-render-diagnostics
scripts.install: node-pre-gyp install || echo 'Your system is not supported by @cubejs-backend/native, some feature will be unavailable.'
scripts.upload-binary-cross: mkdir -p native && cp index.node native/index.node && node-pre-gyp package --target_arch=$PACKAGE_TARGET_ARCH --target_platform=$PACKAGE_TARGET_PLATFORM --target_libc=$PACKAGE_TARGET_LIBC && node-pre-gyp-github publish
scripts.upload-binary: mkdir -p native && cp index.node native/index.node && node-pre-gyp package && node-pre-gyp-github publish
